Relatively close to the AP-7 motorway, a good area to rest before visiting Barcelona. There is a fountain nearby. I emphasize respect for the environment and the neighbors.

description: Parking only during the day next to the Mollet soccer field. At the entrance there is a sign prohibiting parking from 11pm to 8am. It is located on the outskirts of the town, easy access. Ideal for a stopover or to spend the day. At the end of the parking lot there is a skatepark. There are garbage containers next to the entrance to the parking lot. The car park is surrounded by green areas, ideal for walking the dog. Behind the soccer field there is a pedestrian bridge that crosses the highway and leads to walking paths between the cultivated fields. At the access to the car park there are two concrete blocks that make the passage narrow. Vans fit but be careful.

title: (08410) Vilanova del Vallès - 2 Carrer Noruega
description: MODIFICATION: not suitable for motorhomes. Due to the absence of signage throughout the municipality and following a comment, I have reviewed the municipal ordinance and it indicates that motorhomes can only park next to the cultural center and the parking lot next to the town hall. Vans or vehicles approved as residential vehicles are not considered in the ordinance, so they can park here. Beautiful place in the middle of the forest, secluded and quiet. It is reached by a dirt track in good condition from the school road. The place is on the right hand side going down the road. There are other flat spaces to park on the same path a few meters before this location. ATTENTION! Be careful with Google Maps, if you put this location it can take you to another place or by another path. The only viable access is from the school. Mark the school as the destination to arrive correctly. Then take the dirt road going straight. No services but good coverage. Let's keep the place clean for everyone to enjoy.

The only problem might be teenagers parking their cars at the very end of the street and hiking a bit up to the mountain to drink alcohol and play music there on Friday or Saturday night.

title_short: (08042) Barcelona - 326 Carretera Alta de les Roquetes

No water, but there are plenty of fountains in the city. Be careful when traveling in the city, the pound is almost immediate for the French who do not pay the parking meter.

title: (08917) Badalona - 20029 Carrer de Luxemburg
description: We have an 8 meter motorhome so it wouldn’t fit in the IKEA/decathlon car parks. But we parked in the road in front of IKEA entrance. Roads around IKEA also had lorries overnight parked. But felt safe leaving motorhome in front of IKEA entrance with security guard. Used toilets and ate in IKEA. 1euro pancakes = Cheap breakfast! Stayed 1 night.

title: (08173) Barcelona - Avda. de les Roquetes
description: Park & Ride for 500 vehicles with a bus at the door direct to the center. The bus only runs from Monday to Friday except August. 15 minutes walk from the center.

title: (08917) Badalona - 8 Carrer de la Filosofia
description: Lidl car park. We slept one night and everything was fine. Flat and quiet area. (Tip for those who want to go and see Barcelona later: leave the vehicle at IKEA and move by public transport. Guarded, safe parking near the bus stop. Parking height 2.10 m (ok for VW T6)

title: (08917) Badalona - 1 Avinguda de la Comunitat Europea
title_short: (08917) Badalona - 1 Avinguda de la Comunitat Europea
description: Campingaz refill bottles (901 and larger) and LPG bottles are sold here.

title: () Valldoriolf -
description:
Are you looking for a safe and quiet place near Barcelona? Here you can spend the night because you don't need much to travel!

IMPORTANT: During this summer, since there are not many shady areas, it is better to avoid being there between 11 in the morning and 8 in the afternoon.

To contact do it only via whatsapp, telegram, signal or email. Not calls. Thank you. Riki.

There is a bus stop (400) 1.5 km away that goes directly to BCN. It takes 30 minutes and costs €4.5/person.

The Montmeló circuit is 3km away. You can walk safely.

title: (08410) Vilanova del Vallès - BV-5159
description:
Hello! We are the Pedrón de Sande family (Eli, Alfred and Pau who is 4 and a half years old, also "Suro" a super good and sociable puppy and Lluna a 7 month old border colie puppy).
We live in the middle of cultivated fields and forests. Our life system is slowlife and we would love to receive you on our land.
The location is surrounded by fields and forest. There are no industrial noises and very few cars pass through the area.
The land we offer is flat with short grass, access is super easy.
There is no hot water but you have several outlets outside.
You have available the WiFi of the house with a good connection.
Regarding rules, we want to promote common sense: use electricity conscientiously, garbage collection, collection of
animal droppings, respect the rest of the family that lives in the house.
Always welcome! Greetings.

title: (08917) Badalona - 7 Carrer de la Ciència
description: Just a simple car park that is free for day & overnight. We stayed for 3 nights with no problem and was a 15 min walk to Badalona metro station (gets you into Barcelona). Probably only suitable for smaller motor homes or vans and advisable to only park if there are an abundance of spaces (there seemingly usually is) as the residents of the buildings nearby use it

title: (08917) Badalona - 49 Travessera de Montigalà
description: It is a quiet parking lot next to a very large park where you can relax, take dogs out, take children out to play and walk around the area a bit

title: (08042) Barcelona - 1X Carrer de les Torres
description: Parking near trinitat nova Station that takes you straight into the city centre in roughly 25minutes. Very busy and car spaces are close together. Be cautious of this. I advice arriving in the morning before the masses arrive

name: Área de Autocaravanas Granollers
title: (08401) Área de Autocaravanas Granollers
description: Motorhome area with 13 parking spaces DO NOT PUT BLACK WATER IN THE DRINKING WATER SUPPLY! It has a different place for that, right next to where organic matter is concerned. Maximum 4 days, bottle area every day. Big freeway next to heavy traffic all day

title: (08030) Barcelona - 149 Passeig de Torras i Bages
title_short: (08030) Barcelona - 149 Passeig de Torras i Bages
description: Parking near a metro station. Seems safe during the day.

title: (08915) Badalona - 1 Carrer de l'Energia
description: Quiet place to spend the night. Supermarket nearby and bus stop leading to the subway.

title: (08401) Granollers - Carrer de Joan Vinyoli, 2
description: Free public parking. 10 min from the center. Supermarkets and restaurants nearby.

title: (08042) Barcelona - Ronda de la Guineueta Vella, 59
title_short: (08042) Barcelona - Ronda de la Guineueta Vella, 59
description:
Here we found 3 parkings. Better to use the 1. Quite flat and asphalted. A lot of car movement! A neighbor parks his car years ago and told me there are no problems. The entrance is easy. The Canyelles L3 metro is 10 minutes away.
Recall that motorhomes are prohibited in Barcelona
No shade, no services

title: (08915) Badalona - 1 Carrer de Ferrer Bassa
description: Repsol gas station with filling dispenser for LPG and sale of butane cylinders, also has 24h laundry service and a small shop with bread sale 24 hours every day of the year

title: (08207) Sabadell - 98 Diseminado Masia Can Deu
description: Area outside Sabadell (Barcelona) where you can enjoy free parking, as well as tables and barbecue for rent. 5 minutes from Sabadell center and 30 minutes from BCN. No service. There is a mosque. It's right at the entrance of the forest where you can ejoy a walk. Perfect for sleeping and ideal for a stop.

title: (08228) Terrassa - 17 C-58
description: It is a gas station where you can load water. The price is 1 euro for 5 minutes but a good stream comes out and we have filled the 90 L tank for 1 euro.

title: (08140) Caldes de Montbui - Carrer de Bigues
title_short: (08140) Caldes de Montbui - Carrer de Bigues
description: Huge car park set up in the town with several esplanades, quiet and flat to spend a day and spend the night and see the town and surroundings. Nice trails and roads just outside of town.

title: (08173) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 1Z Ronda Nord
title_short: (08173) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 1Z Ronda Nord
description: A spacious parking lot close to the shops and the pharmacy. Has a significant slope.

title: (08328) Alella - 6 Avinguda Sant Josep de Calassanç
title_short: (08328) Alella - 6 Avinguda Sant Josep de Calassanç
description: Beautiful little bivouac, near Barcelona, with a small natural park in the forest. A paradise for walks, trail, mountain bike. Certainly tricky to park there in high season

title: (08030) Barcelona - Carrer de Potosí
description: Large free car park. Very close to public toilets (in the gas station / Carrefour). Close to Metro stop Torres i Bages which goes directly to Arc de Triomf. No place to shower (unless you have one in your van/solar shower). WiFi in the shopping plaza opposite the carpark can be picked up from the spaces closest to the road.

title: (08035) Barcelona - Carretera BV-1415 (carretera de Horta a Cerdanyola)
title_short: (08035) Barcelona - Carretera BV-1415 (carretera de Horta a Cerdanyola)
description: Known as Montbau viewpoint, it is an area to rest with plenty of tables and good views of Barcelona. There is no water (as far as I know). It is accessed from the road easily visible. Plenty of room to park and easy to maneuver. The parking there is a bit of shade

address.street: Carretera BV-1415 (carretera de Horta a Cerdanyola)

title: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - BV-5159
description: Parking Canine Aquapark "Perros al agua" There is a large esplanade where you can leave your vehicle to spend a day at the Aquapark. Inside the enclosure there are bathrooms, beach bars, meals (chickens, pizza, salad, pancakes, ice cream...) It is an ideal place to spend the day with children and our 4-legged friends. It is suitable for people with disabilities.

title: (08211) Castellar del Vallés - Ronda Llevant
description: Large asphalted car park with little traffic (practically empty during the day except from 17 to 20 when some cars park there). Right next to a very large park with public fountains of drinking water. Bakery at the other end of the park 2 minutes, bars and cafes also nearby and the bus stop in the same parking. There is a bus line to Barcelona although the alternative is to go down to Sabadell and from there train or bus to the capital. In summer great water play area for children (and not so children ...). In full nature with many trails to practice sport and routes by bike and walking. Some motorhomes parked in the same street. Picnic tables in the park.

title: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 50 Carrer Mare de Déu del Roser
title_short: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 50 Carrer Mare de Déu del Roser
description: Clear, quiet parking, with supermarkets nearby, gas stations, water supply at 600m and level parking. Walking 3 minutes you reach the Volpelleres station and in 30 minutes by train you are in the heart of Barcelona

address.street: 50 Carrer Mare de Déu del Roser

title: (08140) Caldes de Montbui - 5 Carrer Torre Roja
title_short: (08140) Caldes de Montbui - 5 Carrer Torre Roja
description: Esplanade of land, sports area parking, quiet,  5 minutes from the old town.

title: (08030) Barcelona - 46 Carrer de Ferran Junoy
description: Day parking in a free shopping center. Torres i bages metro nearby. Open from 08:30 to 00:30.

title: (08390) Montgat - 17a Avinguda Can Serra
description: Two drinkable water taps at the local sports playground in Montgat

title: (08187) Santa Eulàlia de Ronçana - 2 Carrer Joan I
title_short: (08187) Santa Eulàlia de Ronçana - 2 Carrer Joan I
description: Park Can Farell restaurant, sports facilities and good restaurant

title: (08402) Granollers - 2 Carrer d'Isaac Albéniz
description: Self-service laundry with 5 washers and 4 dryers.  All very clean and spacious. You can pay with coins or bank card at the cashier machine

title: (08328) Alella - 29 Avinguda Ferran Fabra
description: I went to the other parking lot that was marked in the application and it was full, It is true that from September 3 to 8 are the holidays here. Testing streets I got to this parking lot, there was 1 motorhome and 3 vans. Super quiet and the neighbors said very safe. I caught the town festivals and there was a lot of atmosphere in the square but 0 discomfort to sleep. No overnight prohibition sign.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 117 Carretera Horta a Cerdanyola
description: Orchard viewpoint. Something closer than the following and in my opinion with better views. In Covidien times at 10pm there was no one but when I arrived I found several cars with youth partying.

title: (08911) Badalona - 101 Carrer d'Occitània
description: Free parking near the beach next to a small park with water and something shady with trees and near bp gas station and near restaurants.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 44 Plaça del Cementiri d'Horta
description: Cemetery parking, very quiet and safe, during the day it is busy having the funeral home next door.

title: (08390) Montgat - 51 Carrer Riera de Sant Jordi
title_short: (08390) Montgat - 51 Carrer Riera de Sant Jordi
description: Fountain with a lot of pressure at the end of a dead end street where you can fill discreetly and without haste

title: (08328) Alella - 44 Carrer de la Riera Principal
title_short: (08328) Alella - 44 Carrer de la Riera Principal
description: Source of drinking water with a new tap. Under the plane tree, across from the skate park.

title: (08390) Montgat - Av. Unió, 60
description: Large sand parking without services very quiet at night and a little busier during the day along areas of municipal sports equipment, institute, library, soccer field and cemetery enjoys privileged views of the coast of Barcelona

title: (08390) Montgat - 11B Avinguda de les Vilares
description: Neighborhood parking spot, very calm, with some trees

title: (08911) Badalona - 6 Carrer de Madoz
description: Optimus hardware store sale of reusable gas camping and disposable butsir cylinders

title: (08035) Barcelona - 10I Vial Camino
description: Good parking spot for day and night on dead end street. Playground for kids and watertaps within 3min walk.

title: (08140) Caldes de Montbui -
description: Small stretch of land between a couple of roads, surrounded by trees. We stayed to sleep and we were fine, yes it is true that the roads are somewhat frequented at night, but it was not a problem for us.

title: (08911) Badalona - 38 Carretera de Mataró
description: Here you can stay a free night near Barcelona in autumn / winter even free! It is right on the sea unfortunately also on the rail! Drinking water is also available

title: (08911) Badalona - 36 Carrer Marina
description: Possibility of loading water

title: (08402) Granollers - 18 Avinguda Sant Esteve
description: Self-service laundry "Lavarapid". They have 6 washers and 3 dryers. Payment by bank card or coins.

title: (08912) Badalona - Carrer de Güell i Ferrer, 69
title_short: (08912) Badalona - Carrer de Güell i Ferrer, 69
description: Laundry mat. Washing machine and dryer 17kg / 10kg. They also have free WiFi.

title: (08402) Granollers - 6975 Camí Santa Quitèria
description: Municipal parking

name: Camping El Pasqualet
title: (08140) Camping El Pasqualet
description:
Perfect to visit Barcelona anytime during the year. 
Our camping is situated in Caldes de Montbui, Barcelona, in the middle of the gorgeous landscape of Vallès Oriental, at only 30 Km from Barcelona (by car or by bus). It's an ideal place to do excursions, enjoying the Farell's mountain, or just relax in the thermal baths of Caldes. 
We invite to you to enjoy some days of peace and tranquillity in touch with the nature! And everything really near from Barcelona.

title: (08174) Barcelona - Avinguda de la Generalitat
description: Public parking with long spaces, in a quiet and sunny area. very close to the center.

title: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Camí de la Rabassada a Sant Medir
title_short: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Camí de la Rabassada a Sant Medir
description: Quiet night near Barcelona in a dead end. Straight and winding road. for the vans: ok. No service but a water point at the hermitage and picnic tables. 20min from the train station "Les Planes". Ideal for visiting Barcelona by public transport.

address.street: Camí de la Rabassada a Sant Medir

title: (08328) Alella - Ctra Masnou Granollers
description: Self-wash for large vehicles, accepts coins of 0.50, 1 and 2 euros, exchange machine for 5 or 10 euro bits.

title: (08173) Barcelona - 42 Carretera Rabassada
description: Place to spend the night in nature in peace.

title: (08198) - 58 Barri Sant Medi
description: Quiet place, natural park, camping and night prohibited. Many stops on this road where you can park. No cars passing.

title: (08173) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 2 Avinguda del Puig de Rimila
title_short: (08173) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 2 Avinguda del Puig de Rimila
description: Excellent parking in Turó de Can Matas. You can park the vehicle 24/7

title: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Avinguda d'Europa
title_short: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Avinguda d'Europa
description: Parking for motorhomes not guarded very close to the Sant Cugat - Rubí exit of the AP7 motorway. Area to spend the night without any kind of service. Very close to the shopping center. 32 seats in battery plus 15 in line.

title: (08918) Badalona -
description: Several free places along the boulevard around the tram, passing and lively. advantages: outside the ZBE and on the direct metro to the city center. Possibility to park in the adjacent quieter streets for the night. Garbage cans and shops.

title: (08227) Terrassa - 4 Diseminado Torre Mossen Homs
description: Parking and picnic area (with tables and seats) at the Can Bonvilar information center. A place in Terrassa where you can walk and cycle with the family (easy level) in its surroundings.

title: (08020) Barcelona - 184 Passeig de la Verneda
description: Parking where you can leave the car during the day and night. There is no surveillance, a lot of sun.

title: (08227) Terrassa - 4 Diseminado Torre Mossen Homs
description: Ground parking with views of La Mola. Next to a recreational zone with tap water and picknick tables. Directly underneath high voltage electricity lines that buzz.

title: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 594 Avinguda de la Via Augusta
title_short: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 594 Avinguda de la Via Augusta
description: Parking x car near the mall, quiet day and night .... we had no problem.

title: (08228) Les Fonts - 31 Carrer de Caterina Albert
title_short: (08228) Les Fonts - 31 Carrer de Caterina Albert
description: Level public car park, next to Les Font station. Quiet at night.

title: (08912) Badalona - 197 Carrer del Progrés
description: Laundry with places to park nearby. possibility of paying in cash or card. Possibility of washing clothes and accessories for pets Open from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m. There is a bakery/bar next door

title: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 28 Carrer Llentiscle
title_short: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 28 Carrer Llentiscle
description: Nice place for those who want to visit Barcelona. Quiet, some cars start circulating around 07:00. No services nearby.

title: (08227) Terrassa - 12 Carrer Navarra
description: Vienna terrassa est parking

title: (08320) El Masnou - 574 Carrer Amadeu I
description: Good location for an overnight stay. Its not beautiful but you have several shops and restaurants near by.

title: (08228) Les Fonts - 6 Passeig Muntanya
description: Parking near les font station with shade. Gravel floor, practically level. There are 2 parking areas. Be careful if the gps leads you through a 2.7 tunnel there is another access above the roads if you come from Rubí.

title: (08227) Terrassa - 460 Avinguda del Vallès
description: Public parkin belonging to the town hall of Terrassa, in front of bingo, mercadona, carrefour, quiet and free, does not close at night and very wide

title: (08227) Terrassa - 10 Carrer Navarra
description: Washing machine for your clothes close to a supermarket and a couple restaurants

title: (08035) Barcelona - 230I Carretera de l' Arrabassada
description: Quiet, nice and shady. next to a shelter.

title: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - 67 Carrer de Balmes
title_short: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - 67 Carrer de Balmes
description: Free day parking next to the metro entrance to visit the city

title: (08195) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 31 Carrer Alfons el Magnànim
title_short: (08195) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 31 Carrer Alfons el Magnànim
description: Unregulated parking in a secure area, 10 minutes from the train station. Any secondary street in this area is suitable for overnight stays and is safe, ideal for visiting Barcelona.

title: (08430) La Torreta - C-1415c
description: Repsol gas station with LPG

title: (08035) Barcelona - 8 Carrer Juan de Ávila
description: Free parking with views of Barcelona

title: (08320) El Masnou - 7 Carrer Amadeu I
description: Parking without services, many vehicles, pizzeria nearby. It's not bad to spend a night at 300m from the beach.

title: (08401) Granollers - 37 Carrer Ripollès
description: Area next to the Lledoner park, quiet and ideal for a stop on the road, picnic area, pee can, and playground. Without services

title: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 3 Avinguda de la Via Augusta
title_short: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 3 Avinguda de la Via Augusta
description: Repsol station with LPG

title: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Camí de la Rabassada a Sant Medir
title_short: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Camí de la Rabassada a Sant Medir
description: Very calm place in full nature, possibility of spending the night for free

address.street: Camí de la Rabassada a Sant Medir

name: Càmping Masnou
title: (08320) Càmping Masnou
description: Good for its proximity to Barcelona.The train station (trains to Barcelona run regularly - ATTENTION 2 ZONES buy a ticket) and the beach are a short walk away. Sanitary facilities are getting old but always clean and there is always enough paper available. Good compromise to visit the city and leave the vehicle safely.

title: (08191) Rubí - 8 Carrer d'Hipatia
description: Public parking approximately 15 minutes from the center of Rubí and the train station in front of the Can Oriol park.

title: (08227) Terrassa - 6 Torre Mossen Homs
description: Drinking water point to recharge.

title: (08930) Santa Coloma de Gramenet - 14 Carrer Maragall
title_short: (08930) Santa Coloma de Gramenet - 14 Carrer Maragall
description: Fresh Laundry.

title: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Unnamed Road
description: Very tight spot for 1 4x4, small patch out of the way and off the road, under a large pylon (it's silent) ideal for a last minute stop.

name: CanVan
title: (08329) CanVan
description: Temporarily closed. CanVan, private property where a family with two small children lives. Nice and cozy place with chickens, games for children and a vegetable garden. Contact and reservation required. There are no services. Direct bus to Barcelona 2 minutes from the house at about €3 each way.

title: (08329) Teià - 2 Camí del Cementiri
description: Parking to park and spend the night, with views.

title: (08035) Barcelona -
description: Surrounded by nature, drinking water

title: (08035) Barcelona - 9 Carrer de la Granja Vella
title_short: (08035) Barcelona - 9 Carrer de la Granja Vella
description: Free paved parking

title: (08329) Teià - 40 Avinguda J Roca Suarez L
title_short: (08329) Teià - 40 Avinguda J Roca Suarez L
description: Large car park day and night near a library at the entrance to the city. (Prohibition sign for vehicles over 3.5 tonnes) We slept quietly there (5 campers)

title: (08197) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 3 Carrer Rosas
title_short: (08197) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 3 Carrer Rosas
description: There are lots of parking spaces in side streets, like this one, the train station is not far and you can get to downtown Barcelona by train in about 25 minutes. We didn't sleep here, but it shouldn't be a problem either

title: (08035) Barcelona - 20 Avinguda del Jordà
description: A good place for parking. No green zone marking. Drinking water available.  Metro 5min.

title: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - 531 Avinguda de la Platja
title_short: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - 531 Avinguda de la Platja
description: Place to sleep and spend the day you have a public toilet in the same Alcampo train and bus station nearby to go to Barcelona to visit

title: (08035) Barcelona - 12 Carrer de Coll i Alentorn
title_short: (08035) Barcelona - 12 Carrer de Coll i Alentorn
description: Free parking on gravel field. Right next to a soccer field. Approximately 30 min walk to Park Güell. Metro station nearby. Easy access to the city. No service, only parking.

title: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - 1Z Carrer de Sant Sadurní
title_short: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - 1Z Carrer de Sant Sadurní
description: Open space to park and spend the night without problems with access from the road, spacious and quite quiet place with a small stream next to where you can walk with pets, right in front of a Caprabo supermarket, 250m from restaurants for lunch / dinner.

title: (08197) Valldoreix - 11 Rambla Mossèn Jacint Verdaguer
description: Ground parking right next to the train stop. An area to get to Barcelona. In 20 minutes you are in the center. I have seen vans several times and it seems that there is no problem at the moment...

title: (08420) Canovelles - 1L Carrer Indústria
description: It is a very fast and efficient service. I arrived full of mosquitoes and dirt and in the end it was like new. And they gave me a soft drink and a coffee!!! It's a great service BUT it's best to call first and make an appointment because otherwise you might be waiting a while behind a long line of trucks.

title: (08223) Terrassa - 4-6 Carrer de Badalona
description: Parking day and night, without services, next to the sports complex, 3 places for large vehicles.

title: (08027) Barcelona - 11 Baixada de la Sagrera
description: Parking in the neighborhood of Sagrera, shops and public transport nearby, during the day has a lot of activity the night is quieter, ideal to visit Barcelona

title: (08197) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 39 Rambla Mossèn Jacint Verdaguer
title_short: (08197) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 39 Rambla Mossèn Jacint Verdaguer
description: Parking for vehicles less than 6mtrs, fair space, but flat. Nearby there are trails to visit the Sierra de Collserola.

title: (08035) Barcelona - Camí de Can Borni
description: Super quiet place and unique views, flat. Surrounded by nature. By day they park to go to Tibidabo. To the side there is also a private parking. . Site for 10 motorhomes there is water at 600metros

name: Camping L'Esplanada
title: (08187) Camping L'Esplanada
description: Quiet campsite to rest, complete minimum services.

title: (08521) Bellavista - 92 Carrer Orient
description: It is a parking lot, it is not controlled but it is very quiet and we spent the night and nobody said anything to us and nobody bothered us. It is in the same town there are neighbors next to it and it looks like a safe place

title: (08339) Òrrius - Vilassar de Dalt
description: Car park in Can Boquet park. I stayed in low season and it was very quiet.

title: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Turó del Fumet
title_short: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Turó del Fumet
description:
Superb spot to sleep peacefully and safely.
Located at the end of a path (dead end) on the heights of the Park Collserola in the middle of a forest of oaks and pines. Flat area, easy access for camper or van without height limitation with the possibility of maneuvering and parking at night and day. This is the ideal place to visit Barcelona, just go down to the village of Floresta, located 2 km away with free parking and use the inter-quoted train (FGC) that drops you off in just 15 minutes. Catalonia (terminus) in the center of Barcelona and without change of train, ditto for the return!
Ideal both for discovering or going out on Barcelona which makes the availability of trains.

title: (08226) Terrassa - 189 Rambla de Francesc Macià
description: Big site. With many seats. It's okay.

title: (08191) Rubí - 8 Carrer del Gimnàs
description: Municipal parking

title: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - s/n Carrer de Dolores Ibarruri Pasionaria
title_short: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - s/n Carrer de Dolores Ibarruri Pasionaria
description: Parking lot next to the factory

address.street: s/n Carrer de Dolores Ibarruri Pasionaria

title: (08227) - 18 Carrer Mossen Batlle
description: Free barrier-free parking

title: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 29 Avinguda de l'Estació
title_short: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 29 Avinguda de l'Estació
description: Very convenient to get to central Barcelona by train in 15 minutes for 2.40 euros. Station 5 mins walk up the street, next to the café.

title: (08320) El Masnou - 30 Carrer Parlament de Catalunya
title_short: (08320) El Masnou - 30 Carrer Parlament de Catalunya
description: Free parking spot 10min walk from the beach. Next to a kids music school so area was very busy early in the evening but no one seemed to mind that we parked there, cooked dinner etc. We didn’t stay overnight but I’m sure it wouldn’t be a problem either. Very safe area. If you walk down to the beach you can take a shower there.

title: (08024) Barcelona - 77 Carrer de Josep Serrano
description: Quiet and asphalt parking
